eheth pa්ranandu hitapu janapathi mahinda rajapaksha samaga kiya aththe thaman samawa illimak sidunokala bawaya.pasu awasthawaka madhya hamuwak pawathwu ohu, kadawatimata onna menna thaththwayaka athi rajayata nawatha noyana bawa pa්rasiddhiyema pawasuwe ya.japana sancharayak atharathura di, hitapu janapathiwarayage gnyathiyaku menma rusiyawe hitapu shi්ra lanka thanapathi – wimarshana kihipayakma sadaha shi්ra lanka wimarshana ansha hata awashyama pudgalayaku wana – udayanga wirathunga mahatha hamuwuwe yayi, pa්ranandugen eeta pera awasthawaka polisiya pa්rashna kara thibina.
